titleStmt.title: Captain Charles Newy's case impartially laid open, or, A true and full narrative of the clandestine proceedings aginst [sic] him as it was hatched, contrived, and maliciously carried on by Mrs. Margaret Newey, widdow.
titleStmt.author: Newey, Charles.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
